org.trellisldp.http

Class LdpResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trellisldp.http.LdpResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter

    @PreMatching
 @Provider
 @Priority(value=2020)
 @Singleton
 @Path(value="{path: .*}")
public class LdpResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
    A ContainerRequestFilter that also matches path-based HTTP resource operations.

    Requests are pre-filtered to validate incoming request headers and query parameters.
